data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Saône-et-Loire unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Saône-et-Loire, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 37.62 percent of the people of Saône-et-Loire are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 7,053 believers in the county of Saône-et-Loire.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Saône-et-Loire, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Swiss-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Swiss-speaking people.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Saône-et-Loire, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Saône-et-Loire who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Saône-et-Loire, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France has a population of 574,000.

We estimate Saône-et-Loire has 7,053 people who might know Jesus, 351,012 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 215,935 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Saône-et-Loire with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
